title.zh: 线上：NHPCC女性与衰老专题研讨会
title.en: Online: NHPCC Webinar on Women, Aging, and Hemostasis

description.zh: 左钰洁参加由美国国家血友病项目协调中心（NHPCC）和世界女性出血性疾病基金会（FWGBD）联合主办的Ages and Stages系列研讨会——”Still Bleeding, Still Strong: Women, Aging, and Hemostasis（仍在流血，依然坚强：女性、衰老与止血）”。本次会议聚焦女性衰老与止血问题，由西宾夕法尼亚血友病中心的跨学科团队主讲，探讨女性在衰老过程中面临的生理和血液学变化，包括更年期及相关年龄段的健康管理，以及与出血性疾病管理相关的年龄相关合并症。
description.en: Attended the final session of the Ages and Stages webinar series, co-hosted by the National Hemophilia Program Coordinating Center (NHPCC) and the Foundation for Women and Girls with Blood Disorders (FWGBD) - 'Still Bleeding, Still Strong: Women, Aging, and Hemostasis'. This session focused on women and aging, featuring an interdisciplinary team from the Hemophilia Center of Western Pennsylvania, discussing physiologic and hematologic changes women face as they age, including menopause management and age-related comorbidities in the context of bleeding disorder management.
